content.question: Let <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 1 plus 3 sec x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>sec</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, what are the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-coordinates of the points of intersection of the graphs of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x equals pi over 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals pi over 6"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ​and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
